```{r echo=FALSE}



library(shiny)

ui <- fluidPage(
  titlePanel("Hello App"),
  sidebarLayout(
    sidebarPanel(
      sliderInput("obs","Observations",min=0,max=1000,value = 400),
      numericInput("cnrSamples","Introduce the number of samples",value = 2000,min=1,max=5000),
      sliderInput("cslBreak","Introduce the number of breaks",min = 10,max = 100,value=50),
      textInput("ctxName","Introduce your name"),
      dateRangeInput("cdtSch","When do you plan to travel?")
    ),
    mainPanel(
      plotOutput("distPlot")
    )
  )
)

server <- function(input, output, session) {
  
  output$distPlot = renderPlot({
    lst_nor = rnorm(input$cnrSamples)
    hist(lst_nor,breaks=input$cslBreak)
  })
  
}

shinyApp(ui, server)

```
